CustomField.formula: IF(NS_Payment_Frequency__c = "Semi-Annual", MCEILING(License_Term_Formula__c / 6), IF(NS_Payment_Frequency__c = "Annual", MCEILING(License_Term_Formula__c / 12), IF(NS_Payment_Frequency__c = "Quarterly", MCEILING(License_Term_Formula__c / 3), License_Term_Formula__c)))
CustomField.label: NS Recurrence Count
